price: 46. (Alle) Wuxuu yidhi: Ha cabsannina, Anigaa idin la jira, waan maqli oo arkaa.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
